column1: Smoque BBQ////Best BBQ in Chicago.  Been several times.  It's not as good as The Germantown Commissary which I think is the best pork BBQ in the US.  The last time I was there
column2: the ribs were not as moist
column3: and a little too dry.  Texas link was good-although I'd prefer them to be a bit hotter.  Cornbread was decent
column4: and the mac and cheese was good.  Coleslaw was okay.  Kids had the pulled pork and they said it was very good (but not as good as mine : )
